settings.custom_html: At Confidential Couture you will have the unique opportunity to innovate, inspire others, and engage with fashion at the highest level.

custom_css: h3 {text-decoration: underline; font-weight: 400 !important; font-family: Amiri, sans-serif !important; line-height: 1; font-size: 3.5rem;}

settings.custom_html:
Comradery Forward Thinking Global Access
Whether you're working on the next tech update or shooting clothes from the latest runway collection, our teams are always working closely together–and having fun. We are always looking for what's new and what's next–we are motivated by discovery. Whether an emerging designer, an undiscovered photographer or website feature, our teams make an impact. Our employees and our clients have unrivaled global access. Our Merchandising team attends fashion weeks in multiple cities around the world, enabling our global Stylist team to curate unparalleled selections for clients – often including names you haven't heard before and pieces you won't find anywhere else

custom_css: p {margin-top: 0rem; margin-bottom: 2.7rem; font-size: 16px !important; font-weight: 400 !important; font-family: Jost, sans-serif;}

settings.custom_html:
Louis, Louis, Fendi, Fendi, Gucci, Gucci, Prada, Prada! Names so nice, you’ll say them twice.

If you’re one of those who live and breathe luxury, then Confidentail Couture is your destonation of luxury! Know your brands inside out? Is Hedonism your school of thought? Then you’re the person we’re looking for! Fill the form with your updated resume.!

The Confidential Couture is the leading online market place for luxury and fashion products in the India, with our HQ based in Delhi. Our people and values have built our success and made us who we are as a fast growing up company because we think collective : we work with style, with entrepreneurial spirit and with passion
